articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: Mineral-rich, war-torn DRC first stop for Trump's new Africa czar - NPR
articles.description: Massad Boulos, Trumps new Senior Advisor for Africa and father-in-law to daughter Tiffany Trump, kicks starts his first official trip on the continent, with a visit to the mineral rich and war wracked Democratic Republic of Congo.
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG, South Africa President Trump's new senior advisor for Africa kicked off his first official trip to the continent on Thursday in the mineral-rich but conflict-ridden Great Lakes region.… [+3035 chars]
